message: Also why you guys don't have image uploading feature?
p.s. I don't work for them but heard about them on convore and it's pretty handy.
try ualoo.com for images in the meantime.
(I have started a new topic for image questions)
it would be cool if they have image upload feature kinda like Pownce [leah's other startup]
i think time to split the image talk to another topic... or haven't that done already?
@Magazine3 oops convore is also co-founded by Leah...
@Magazine3 @zerok @itsnotvalid Would you mind discussing that in another thread? This is convore Email related. Kinda confusing.
IMO there are enough great image platforms out there. Why re-invent the wheel when you can just share images by linking to them? It's not like Twitter has an image upload feature ;-)

@zerok because twitter allows 140 characters   @itsnotvalid  i guess yea, but tell me what do you think? would you like to have image upload feature or you will be happy with copy pasting links from other img uploading sites? ... just want to know your opinion on this.
Agreed, take it to another topic please guys.
